commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas839a4a7"

diff:
"839a4a7 Bug 395099, regression, src attribute not working for statusbarpanel, r=mano, a=bz
diff --git a/toolkit/content/widgets/general.xml b/toolkit/content/widgets/general.xml
index 6e5c050..7bad579 100644
--- a/toolkit/content/widgets/general.xml
+++ b/toolkit/content/widgets/general.xml
@@ -253,7 +253,7 @@
   <binding id="statusbarpanel-menu-iconic" display="xul:menu"
            extends="chrome://global/content/bindings/general.xml#statusbarpanel">
     <content>
-      <xul:image class="statusbarpanel-icon" xbl:inherits="image,image=src"/>
+      <xul:image class="statusbarpanel-icon" xbl:inherits="src,src=image"/>
       <children/>
     </content>
   </binding>
@@ -280,7 +280,7 @@
   <binding id="statusbarpanel-iconic" display="xul:button"
            extends="chrome://global/content/bindings/general.xml#statusbarpanel">
     <content>
-      <xul:image class="statusbarpanel-icon" xbl:inherits="image,image=src"/>
+      <xul:image class="statusbarpanel-icon" xbl:inherits="src,src=image"/>
     </content>
 
     <implementation implements="nsIAccessibleProvider">
@@ -297,7 +297,7 @@
   <binding id="statusbarpanel-iconic-text" display="xul:button"
            extends="chrome://global/content/bindings/general.xml#statusbarpanel">
     <content>
-      <xul:image class="statusbarpanel-icon" xbl:inherits="image,image=src"/>
+      <xul:image class="statusbarpanel-icon" xbl:inherits="src,src=image"/>
       <xul:label class="statusbarpanel-text" xbl:inherits="value=label,crop"/>
     </content>
   </binding>
"
